channel.title: <317><PI> OptimusX - Thriving For Perfection ||Read For Info|| <PI><317>
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j1ojn7.jpg[/img][/center]
[u][b]We Are Thriving For Perfection :)[/b][/u]
[u][b][center]BASICALLY WHAT WE ARE GOING TO BE LOOKING FOR::[/center][/b][/u]
[center]<Bug/Glitch Testers - [1/3]> <Server & Client Coder - [2/4]> <GFX Artists - [0/2]> <Website Developer - [1/2]> <Video Maker/Specialist - [0/4]> <Somebody Who Will "Spread The Word" - [0/2]> <Forum Developer - [0/1]>[/center]
[u][b]HOW TO APPLY::[/b][/u]
[code] Name - Skype - Apply For - Experience - Age - How Long You Can Stay On - Whats The Best Language You Code In (Only For People Applying For Coder) - Why You Want To Join Us -[/code]
[center][b]WHATS INCLUDED IN THE SERVER:[/b][/center]
- Full Dungeoneering - 7+ Minigames *Not 100% But Thats What We Need Coders For* - Full Summoning - 100% Curses - QuickPrayers - 10+ Bosses - Nex - A Whole Lot More!!
[center]PICTURE TIME:[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/15s1vvc.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/8vqgqp.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/szamvs.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28vro7p.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2v29mk7.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34zkqyb.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15wmrmh.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hoi4nd.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]There Is A Lot More To This Server, But Some Of It Is Glitched.. We Want To Release The Server But There Are Still Some Stuff To Be Done. Come Sign Up Today And I Will Try To Contact You ASAP. Good Luck :)[/center]
